skillTree.localised_description: A Bellowerâ€™s voice is as deep as it loud, carrying across the battlefield and encouraging unbridled carnage.
A small handful of Gnoblars surround this Ogre Lord, their swords always ready to cut and carve.
It never hurts to keep your lucky Gnoblar with you, just in case.
Stumpy and short-witted as they are, these Gnoblars have an eye on the sky at all times.
Puny magicks are nothing in the face of the Great Maw's endless hunger.
Presented with his first blade as a whelp to swing about with wild abandon, Bragg has always shown a great affinity for decapitation.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

skillTree.localised_description: Bragg does not fight with grace or finesse, for such traits elude all Ogres, but has a natural gift for landing blows with maximum damage.

effects.description:
Enemy wound recovery time: +3 turns
	(enemy characters in region)

Enemy melee defence: -4
	(enemy armies in local province)

skillTree.localised_description: As a great and powerful Bruiser, Bragg is welcomed into any tribe he joins... until he turns on his fellow Ogres, of course!

effects.description:
Construction cost: -10% for all buildings
	(local province)

skillTree.localised_description: Where Bragg walks, he walks alone, donning his dark leather hood in the manner of a human hangman to capitalise on his grim persona.

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: Where Bragg walks, he goes alone â€“ such is his fell, and foul, reputation.
Once marked for death, one must prepare for Bragg's lumbering shadow looming into view. What no one can prepare for is the Gutgouger's lunge towards their neck...

effects.description: Attacks cause "Disembowelled" effect, draining hit points

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: No beast is too big to be brought to its knees. More meat on its bones is simply more meat for the feast!

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: Bruisers always gravitate towards the thickest bloodshed in battle, looking for any opportunity for wholesale slaughter.
This one has guts â€“ quite literally. A surfeit of stomach in fact, you might say, but also the confidence to back up his bulk.
No enemy is immovable when in the path of a furious Ogre's charge.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
This Ogre's greed shall never be sated, for his stomach is as endless as his hunger.
A truly sturdy armour is needed to hold such an overflowing gut in place.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Bragg feels the need to kill calling him as surely as he feels the voracious stirring of the Great Maw in his own belly.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 10%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 20%
Training action: Unit experience gain is increased by an additional 30%

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).
When attacking braced charge defenders, this unit only loses half of its charge bonus.
Allows the unit to attack and destroy walls in melee. This attribute also adds a  +50% damage multiplier against buildings.

items.colour_text: Forged from a mighty Orc weapon brimming with sorcery, and tempered in the gut-stuff of Bragg's own kinfolk. Neither flesh nor minds can withstand it.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: The champion executioner of Ogrekind and a slayer of kings and heroes; he is Bragg the Gutsman and none he marks for slaughter ever survive.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead
